item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Kezia Paramita add a quote by Noda Megumi
item.description: "Is there anyone who entered a competition in order to lose?" -- Noda Megumi

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "Hindus, in their capacity for love, are indeed hairless Christians, just as Muslims, in the way they see God in everything, are bearded Hindus, and Christians, in their devotion to God, are hat wearing Muslims." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "If you stumble about believability, what are you living for? Love is hard to believe, ask any lover. Life is hard to believe, ask any scientist. God is hard to believe, ask any believer. What is your problem with hard to believe?" -- Yann Martel

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Once you want something, everything changes." -- Ally Condie

item.title: Kezia Paramita add a quote by a headstone in Ireland
item.description: "Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal." -- a headstone in Ireland
